definitions: the quality of being able to be reached or entered

examples.text: the restoration project involved repairing the roof and improving accessibility

shortDefinitions: quality of being able to be reached or entered

definitions: the quality of being easy to obtain or use

examples.text: students were concerned about the accessibility of quality academic counseling

shortDefinitions: quality of being easy to obtain or use

definitions: the quality of being easily understood or appreciated

examples.text: the accessibility of his work helped to popularize modern art

shortDefinitions: quality of being easily understood or appreciated

definitions: the quality of being easily reached, entered, or used by people who have a disability

examples.text: many architects believe that accommodating wheelchairs is all there is to providing accessibility

shortDefinitions: quality of being easily used by people who have disability
